Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 10 Mahantaraduka » 10.2 Cittaduka » 10.2.7 Pañhāvāra
10.2.7.3 Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Mahantaraduka
Cittaduka
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānulomapaccanīya
90.
2539Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi…pe…  nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe ekaṃ, naupanissaye tīṇi (sabbattha tīṇi), namagge tīṇi, nasampayutte ekaṃ, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
<< Suddhaup10.2.7.4 Paccayapaccanīyānuloma >>
